argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | #P_cldcls | |- ( S e. ( Clsd ` J ) -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) = S ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_clscld | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) = S -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> S e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl5ibcom | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) = S -> S e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_impbid2 | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( S e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) = S ) ) |
